android.car.watchdog

类 CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.watchdog.CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback
  • 封闭类:
    CarWatchdogManager

    public abstract static class CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback
extends java.lang.Object
    CarWatchdogClientCallback is implemented by the clients which want to be health-checked by car watchdog server. Every time onCheckHealthStatus is called, they are expected to respond by calling CarWatchdogManager.tellClientAlive(android.car.watchdog.CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback, int) within timeout. If they don't respond, car watchdog server reports the current state and kills them.

    Before car watchdog server kills the client, it calls onPrepareProcessTermination to allow them to prepare the termination. They will be killed in 1 second.

    • 构造器概要

      Car watchdog server pings the client to check if it is alive.
      void onPrepareProcessTermination()
      Car watchdog server notifies the client that it will be terminated in 1 second.

    • 构造器详细资料

        public CarWatchdogClientCallback()

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCheckHealthStatus

        public boolean onCheckHealthStatus(int sessionId,
                                   int timeout)
        Car watchdog server pings the client to check if it is alive.

        The callback method is called at the Executor which is specified in CarWatchdogManager.registerClient(java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.car.watchdog.CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback, int).

        参数:
        sessionId - Unique id to distinguish each health checking.
        timeout - Time duration within which the client should respond.
        返回:
        whether the response is immediately acknowledged. If true, car watchdog server considers that the response is acknowledged already. If false, the client should call CarWatchdogManager.tellClientAlive(android.car.watchdog.CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback, int) later to tell that it is alive.

      • onPrepareProcessTermination

        public void onPrepareProcessTermination()
        Car watchdog server notifies the client that it will be terminated in 1 second.

        The callback method is called at the Executor which is specified in CarWatchdogManager.registerClient(java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.car.watchdog.CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback, int).
